name: TestimonialCardTwo
description: Testimonial card with circular image or icon, name, role, and testimonial text.

description.example: See what our customers have to say

testimonial.example: The attention to detail and commitment to excellence was outstanding throughout the entire project.

imageSrc.note: Optional image path for customer photo. If not provided, icon will be displayed instead.

imageAlt.note: Alt text for image (defaults to customer name if not provided)

icon.note: Optional Lucide icon to display when no image is provided. Defaults to Quote icon.

propsSchema.testimonials: Array<{ id: string, name: string, role: string, testimonial: string, imageSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, icon?: LucideIcon }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <TestimonialCardTwo testimonials={[{ id: '1', name: 'Sarah Mitchell', role: 'Director of Operations', testimonial: 'The attention to detail and commitment to excellence was outstanding.', icon: Package }]} title="Customer Reviews" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
